metadata.title: CVE-2015-1208 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer underflow in the mov_read_default function in libavformat/mov.c inFFmpeg before 2.4.6 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive informationfrom heap and/or stack memory via a crafted MP4 file.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
